abstract: Oakland Raiders quarterback Carson Palmer, acquired in a trade with Cincinnati Bengals, has not played since January, but fans are calling for him to start immediately.
snippet: Quarterback Carson Palmer, acquired in a trade with the Bengals, has not played since January, but fans are calling for him to start immediately.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Carson Palmer, acquired in a trade with the Bengals, has not played since January, but fans are calling for him to start immediately.

headline.main: Raiders Saying Little About Immediate Plans for Palmer, Who Faces Obstacles
headline.print_headline: Raiders Saying Little About Immediate Plans for Palmer, Who Faces Obstacles
headline.seo: Carson Palmer Faces Obstacles to Playing for Raiders
